item.title: Adding Application Insights to a .NET Core application
Customising Umbraco's Default Grid Editors
item.description: Create a new directory in App_Plugins called anything you like. This will be your “package” directoryCopy the web.config file that’s inside the main “Views” directory (not your project’s main web.config!) into your package directory. This is needed for MVC to work properlyCreate a package.manifest file and put this in it (come back and modify these properties as necessary): { “gridEditors”: [{ “name”: “Speaker Portrait”, “alias”: “speakerPortrait”, “view”: “media”, “render”: “/app_plugins/yourpackagedir/MediaMarkup.
